title.narrative: Chad Education Sector Reform Project Phase 2

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to improve teaching and learning conditions in primary schools nationwide and upper secondary schools in selected areas.

participating-org.narrative: Ministere de l'Education Nationale et de la Promotion Civique (MENPC))

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Auditors: Financing Agreement Reference II.B.4 of Schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall recruit, notlater than 4 months after the Effective Date: (a) the external auditor referred to in Section 4.09(b) of the General Conditions inaccordance with Section III of Schedule 2 of this Agreement and pursuant to TORs satisfactory to the Association; and (b) aninternal auditor, whose qualifications and experience and TORs shall be acceptable to the Association | Due Date :30-Apr-2014

Finance Agreement :Internal Auditor | Description :The Recipient shall, no later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, hirean independent external auditor, with terms of reference, experience and qualifications satisfactory to the Association. Sched. 2,Sect. II, B, 4 of the Financing Agreement. | Due Date :23-Apr-2018

Finance Agreement :List of Community Teachers | Description :The Recipient shall, no later than 3 months after the Effective Date,or such other date as the Assoc. may agree in writing, provide: (a) evidence, satisfactory to the Assoc., that a census ofcommunityteachers has been carried out, by an independent entity, all satisfactory to the Assoc.; and (b) a list of EligibleCommunity Teachers, satisfactory to the Assoc. Sched 2, Sec. I,E,1 (a,b) of FA. | Due Date :23-Jan-2018

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Manual | Description :The Recipient shall, no later than three (3) months after theEffective Date, or such other date as the Association may agree in writing, update the Project Implementation Manual in a mannersatisfactory to the Association. Sched 2, Sec. I, B,1 of the FA. | Due Date :23-Jan-2018

Finance Agreement :Staff hiring at PCU: Financing Agreement Reference I.A.2 (b) of Schedule 2 | Description :Not later than 60 daysafter the Effective Date, employ and thereafter maintain, at all times during Project implementation or as agreed with theAssociation, a procurement assistant, M&E specialist, accountant, communication specialist, engineer in civil engineering, and twocivil works technicians each of whose qualifications, experience, and TORs shall be acceptable to the Association | Due Date:28-Feb-2014

Finance Agreement :Staffing | Description :The Recipient shall hire, no later than 3 months after the Effective Date, or such otherdate as the Assoc. may agree in writing, additional fiduciary staff to the PCU, including 2 additional financial managementspecialists, an internal auditor, and additional M&E specialists, all with qualifications, experience, and terms of referencesatisfactory to the Assoc. Sched 2, Sec. I,A,2(b) of the FA. | Due Date :23-Jan-2018
